scripts.db:migrate: cross-env NODE_ENV=production env-cmd npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.db:migrate:undo: cross-env NODE_ENV=production env-cmd npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo
scripts.db:migrate:undo:to: cross-env NODE_ENV=production env-cmd npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all --to
scripts.db:migrate:undo:all: cross-env NODE_ENV=production env-cmd npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all
scripts.db:seed:all: cross-env NODE_ENV=production env-cmd npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.db:seed: cross-env NODE_ENV=production env-cmd npx sequelize-cli db:seed --seed
scripts.db:seed:undo: cross-env NODE_ENV=production env-cmd npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo
scripts.db:seed:undo:all: cross-env NODE_ENV=production env-cmd npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all
